subgoals: Mine coal or smelt wood logs to make charcoal
Craft 1 water bucket using 3 iron ingots
Create 10 obsidian blocks using water on lava
Place 2 obsidian blocks horizontally on the ground
Place 3 obsidian blocks vertically on each end of the 2-block base
Place 2 obsidian blocks horizontally on top to connect the pillars
Use flint and steel on the portal frame to activate it
